mapper.select: SELECT emp_id, work_day, DATE_FORMAT(work_start_time, '%H:%i') as work_start_time, DATE_FORMAT(work_end_time, '%H:%i') as work_end_time, DATE_FORMAT(work_started, '%H:%i') as work_started, DATE_FORMAT(work_ended, '%H:%i') as work_ended from commute_history where emp_id =#{param1} and work_day =#{param2}
SELECT COUNT(work_started) FROM commute_history WHERE emp_id = #{loginId} AND work_day = #{todayDate};
SELECT COUNT(work_ended) FROM commute_history WHERE emp_id = #{loginId} AND work_day = #{todayDate};

SELECT (COALESCE((SELECT SUM(ev.add_hour) FROM emp_vacation ev WHERE ev.emp_id = e.emp_id), 0) - COALESCE((SELECT SUM(vh.use_hour) FROM vacation_history vh WHERE vh.emp_id = e.emp_id), 0)) AS remainhour, COALESCE((SELECT SUM(vh.use_hour) FROM vacation_history vh WHERE vh.emp_id = e.emp_id), 0) AS usehour FROM employee e WHERE emp_id = #{login_id};
